data.persona: I am a robber who lurks outside the village. Every night I wait for travelers journeying out onto the main thoroughfare. When they are near, I jump from behind the bushes with my longsword in my hand. They usually cower in fear and I take their money.
data.description:
You are in the soldiers camp.
The camp is hidden away in a light forest of trees and brush that might be hard to find if there had not been a symbol on the trees leading up to it. You can feel the anxiety of the soldiers here, as this camp is not well fortified by any conventional means, but instead is supposed to be hidden and camouflaged to throw off anyone that might pursue. The camp is nothing more than a fire and some barracks. Nothing fancy to see.
The soldier is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to see what's on the treasure map.
data.mid_motivation: I want to use the treasure map to find buried treasure and hopefully make myself very rich.
data.long_motivation: I want to amass enough wealth to buy myself a potion to resurrect my dead wife, and I will steal and pillage in order to get enough money.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: use shovel with spot marked by map
